entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Becoming sunny this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
